name: Slimes Adventures The Crown
description:
Slimes Adventures The Crown is a small 2d game in early develepment, you can help the game evolve by sharing the game with others.

Credits
  • Art Made by SleepyWombat
  • Music Made by SleepyWombat
  • Code Made by SleepyWombat
  • Fonts From Kenney.nl
  • Made In godot 3.3
  • Art Made in aseprite
Controls
  • Use "A" and "D" or Arrow keys to move left and right
  • Use "Space" or UP Arrow to jump
  • Use "Q" or "W" to deploy a Parachute
  • Use "E" to Open Doors
